price: ߊ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߡߍ߲ ߘߌߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߥߊ߫ ( ߤߙߍ ߡߊ߬ ) ߢߍ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߸ ߥߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߞߐ߫
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
